title: Simple Steps to Get Larger Text on Snapchat

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. Snapchat is a yellow icon with a white ghost inside it.

steps.title: Tap the circle button.
steps.content: Tap the circle button. Doing so will take a photo that serves as the backdrop for your snap.

steps.title: Tap on the center of the screen.
steps.content: Tap on the center of the screen. Doing so will bring up your keyboard so you can input a message.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . Your text will appear on the screen on top of a translucent grey bar.

steps.title: Tap T.
steps.content: Tap T . It's located at the top right corner of the screen. Doing so will make the text larger and bolded. Tap T again to center the text on the screen. Drag the text around the screen to change its placement. You can change the color of your enlarged text by tapping on it, then selecting a color from the color bar on the right side of the screen.
